verses.verse: <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> to the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>

And <S%G3722>early<s%> in the morning he <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to him; and he <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down,<s%> and <S%G1321>taught<s%> them.

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> to him a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2638>taken<s%> in <S%G3430>adultery;<s%> and when they had <S%G2476>set<s%> her in the <S%G3319>middle,<s%>
They <S%G3004>say<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> was <S%G2638>taken<s%> in <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> in the <S%G1888>very<s%> <S%G1888>act.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> in the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1781>commanded<s%> us, that <S%G5108>such<s%> should be <S%G3036>stoned:<s%> but <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you?

<S%G5124>This<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3985>tempting<s%> him, that they might <S%G2192>have<s%> to <S%G2723>accuse<s%> him. But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2955>stooped<s%> <S%G2736>down,<s%> and with his <S%G1147>finger<s%> <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>ground,<s%> as though he <S%G191>heard<s%> them not.

<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they <S%G1961>continued<s%> <S%G2065>asking<s%> him, he <S%G352>lifted<s%> up himself, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, He that is <S%G361>without<s%> <S%G361>sin<s%> among you, let him <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> her.
And <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G2955>stooped<s%> <S%G2736>down,<s%> and <S%G1125>wrote<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>ground.<s%>

And they which <S%G191>heard<s%> it, being <S%G1651>convicted<s%> by their own <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G1520>one<s%> by <S%G1520>one,<s%> <S%G756>beginning<s%> <S%G575>at<s%> the <S%G4245>oldest,<s%> even to the <S%G2078>last:<s%> and <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> and the <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle.<s%>

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G352>lifted<s%> up himself, and <S%G2300>saw<s%> <S%G3367>none<s%> but the <S%G1135>woman,<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> to her, <S%G1135>Woman,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> are <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2725>accusers?<s%> has <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2632>condemned<s%> you?

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of the <S%G2889>world:<s%> he that <S%G190>follows<s%> me shall not <S%G4043>walk<s%> in <S%G4653>darkness,<s%> but shall <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>
The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You <S%G3140>bore<s%> <S%G3140>record<s%> of <S%G4572>yourself;<s%> your <S%G3141>record<s%> is not <S%G227>true.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G2579>Though<s%> I <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>record<s%> of myself, <S%G1683><s%> yet my <S%G3141>record<s%> is <S%G227>true:<s%> for I <S%G1492>know<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G4226>where<s%> I <S%G5217>go;<s%> but you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%> from <S%G4159>where<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> and <S%G4226>where<s%> I go. <S%G5217><s%>
You <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> I <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> man. <S%G3762><s%>
And yet <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2919>judge,<s%> my <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is <S%G227>true:<s%> for I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G3441>alone,<s%> but I and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me.
It is <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> in <S%G5212>your<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> that the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> is true. <S%G227><s%>
I <S%G1510>am<s%> one that <S%G3140>bear<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of <S%G1683>myself,<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me <S%G3140>bears<s%> <S%G3140>witness<s%> of me.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> they to him, <S%G4226>Where<s%> is your <S%G3962>Father?<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> You <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> me, <S%G3777>nor<s%> my <S%G3962>Father:<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> you had <S%G1492>known<s%> me, you should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1492>known<s%> my <S%G3962>Father<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

<S%G5023>These<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> in the <S%G1049>treasury,<s%> as he <S%G1321>taught<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple:<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> laid <S%G4084>hands<s%> on him; for his <S%G5610>hour<s%> was not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to them, I <S%G5217>go<s%> my way, and you shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> me, and shall <S%G599>die<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sins:<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G5217>go,<s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> Will he <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G1438>himself?<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3699>Where<s%> I <S%G5217>go,<s%> you <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You are from <S%G2736>beneath;<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> from <S%G507>above:<s%> you are of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2889>world;<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not of <S%G5127>this<s%> world. <S%G2889><s%>

I <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to you, that you shall <S%G599>die<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sins:<s%> for <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> not that I am <S%G1510><s%> he, you shall <S%G599>die<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> they to him, <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> you? And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Even <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3748>same<s%> that I <S%G2980>said<s%> to you from the beginning. <S%G746><s%>

And he that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me is with me: the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has not <S%G863>left<s%> me <S%G3441>alone;<s%> for I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> things that <S%G701>please<s%> him.
As he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> words, <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> on him, <S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G3306>continue<s%> in my word, <S%G3056><s%> then are you my <S%G3101>disciples<s%> indeed; <S%G230><s%>
And you shall <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and the <S%G225>truth<s%> shall <S%G1659>make<s%> you free. <S%G1659><s%>

They <S%G611>answered<s%> him, We be <S%G11>Abraham's<s%> <S%G4690>seed,<s%> and were <S%G3762>never<s%> <S%G4455><s%> in <S%G1398>bondage<s%> to <S%G3762>any<s%> man: <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you, You shall be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1658>free?<s%>

And the <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> not in the <S%G3614>house<s%> for ever: <S%G165><s%> but the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G3306>stays<s%> ever. <S%G165><s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> shall <S%G1659>make<s%> you <S%G1659>free,<s%> you shall be <S%G1658>free<s%> indeed. <S%G3689><s%>

I <S%G1097>know<s%> that you are <S%G11>Abraham's<s%> <S%G4690>seed;<s%> but you <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> me, <S%G3754>because<s%> my <S%G3056>word<s%> has <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5562>place<s%> in you.

You <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> father. <S%G3962><s%> <S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> they to him, We be not <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G4202>fornication;<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> even <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1302>Why<s%> do you not <S%G1097>understand<s%> my speech? <S%G2981><s%> even <S%G3754>because<s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> my word. <S%G3056><s%>

And <S%G3754>because<s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you the <S%G225>truth,<s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> me not.
<S%G5101>Which<s%> of you <S%G1651>convinces<s%> me of <S%G266>sin?<s%> And <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G1302>why<s%> do you not <S%G4100>believe<s%> me?

He that is of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> <S%G2316>God's<s%> <S%G4487>words:<s%> you therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> them not, <S%G3754>because<s%> you are not of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G3004>Say<s%> we not <S%G2573>well<s%> that you <S%G1488>are<s%> a <S%G4541>Samaritan,<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1140>devil?<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> not a <S%G1140>devil;<s%> but I <S%G5091>honor<s%> my <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and you do <S%G818>dishonor<s%> me.
And I <S%G2212>seek<s%> not <S%G3450>my<s%> own <S%G1391>glory:<s%> there is one that <S%G2212>seeks<s%> and judges. <S%G2919><s%>

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5083>keep<s%> my <S%G3056>saying,<s%> he shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G2334>see<s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> to him, <S%G3568>Now<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that you <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G1140>devil.<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> is <S%G599>dead,<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets;<s%> and you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> keep my saying, he shall <S%G3364>never<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G1488>Are<s%> you <S%G3187>greater<s%> than our <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is <S%G599>dead?<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> are <S%G599>dead:<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> you <S%G4572>yourself?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G1392>honor<s%> <S%G1683>myself,<s%> my <S%G1391>honor<s%> is <S%G3762>nothing:<s%> it is my <S%G3962>Father<s%> that <S%G1392>honors<s%> me; of <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> that he is <S%G5216>your<s%> God: <S%G2316><s%>

Yet you have not <S%G1097>known<s%> him; but I <S%G1492>know<s%> him: and <S%G1437>if<s%> I should <S%G3004>say,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> him not, I shall be a <S%G5583>liar<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to you: but I <S%G1492>know<s%> him, and <S%G5083>keep<s%> his saying. <S%G3056><s%>
